column3: Uncategorized;Kep/Phnom Penh: In the afternoon of February 16
column5: the police was informed by the victim’s wife about her husband’s death.------Liang Simin
column6: a 32-year-old Chinese woman living in Kep
column7: said her husband died on Feb. 15
column8: 2019 at 06:30 am. He was taken from his rented home in Kep to Calmette hospital in Phnom Penh .------The deceased man
column11: died of stroke and chronic lung disease.
